sn51.12:1.1: “Cattarome, bhikkhave, iddhipada bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa.
sn51.12:1.2: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, cattaro iddhipada katham bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa?
sn51.12:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti—
sn51.12:1.4: iti me chando na ca atilino bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattam sankhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddha vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.12:1.6: yatha pure tatha paccha, yatha paccha tatha pure;
sn51.12:1.7: yatha adho tatha uddham, yatha uddham tatha adho;
sn51.12:1.8: yatha diva tatha rattim, yatha rattim tatha diva.
sn51.12:1.9: Iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
sn51.12:2.4: iti me vimamsa na ca atilina bhavissati, na ca atippaggahita bhavissati, na ca ajjhattam sankhitta bhavissati, na ca bahiddha vikkhitta bhavissati.
sn51.12:2.6: yatha pure tatha paccha, yatha paccha tatha pure;
sn51.12:2.7: yatha adho tatha uddham, yatha uddham tatha adho;
sn51.12:2.8: yatha diva tatha rattim, yatha rattim tatha diva.
sn51.12:2.9: Iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
sn51.12:2.10: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, cattaro iddhipada evam bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa.
sn51.12:3.1: Evam bhavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catusu iddhipadesu evam bahulikatesu anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti …pe….
sn51.12:4.1: Evam bhavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catusu iddhipadesu evam bahulikatesu, asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
